data.text: @statsjamie No emergency. No covid strain on the NHS then...
@statsjamie @YorkshireLady3 I can’t believe they are still putting people on ventilators.
@statsjamie Is there data anywhere that shows how many in ICU in omicron period only, broken down by age and vaccination status?

@statsjamie 82% of covid patients are in primarily for other reasons? Or of all general beds 82% are not in hospital with covid? 

The links for these data would be helpful, you often don’t include them.

There are variations across the country in the % of tests coming back positive in Wales.

The highest rate currently is in the Vale of Glamorgan at 27.1% with the lowest in Merthyr Tydfil at 14.9%. https://t.co/e94vEdXelb

Continue to see the percentage of people testing positive when having a PCR fall although signs it is levelling off.

Testing has fallen since changes in guidance on tests. https://t.co/5LILXOyFxR
